gameplay.Bomberman

  • Packages that use Bomberman 
    Package Description
    gameplay  
    menu  

    • Uses of Bomberman in gameplay

      Constructors in gameplay with parameters of type Bomberman 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Bomberman bomberman)
      Constructor that initializes a Game object which is used for starting a new game, thus setting the level to 1.
      Game(Grid grid, Level level, Enemy enemy, Brick brick, Concrete concrete, PowerUps powerups, ExitWay exitway, Bomb bomb, Player player, int currentScore, int currentLevel, int currentLives, int timerPlaying, boolean flamePass, boolean bombPass, boolean wallPass, boolean detonate, Bomberman bomberman)
      Constructor that initializes a Game object which is used for loading a previously saved game.
      Game(int level, Bomberman bomberman)
      Constructor that initializes a Game object which is used for loading a previously unlocked level.
